xsds.baseXsd:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="autnresponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="action" type="NonEmptyString" /> <xs:element name="response" type="NonEmptyString" /> <xs:element name="responsedata" type="xs:anyType" /> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element>
<xs:complexType name="error_responsedata"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="error" type="error"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="error"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="errorid" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="rawerrorid" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="errorstring" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="errordescription" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="errorcode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="errortime" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

actionXsd.xsd:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:include schemaLocation="sharedXsd.xsd"/>
<xs:complexType name="ask_metadata"> <xs:sequence> <xs:any minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" processContents="lax"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="ask_answer"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="text" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="score" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element name="interpretation" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="source" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="metadata" type="ask_metadata" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="answerType" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="systemName" type="xs:string" /> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="ask_answers"> <xs:sequence minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:element name="answer" type="ask_answer"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="ask_responsedata"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="answers" type="ask_answers" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
</xs:schema>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:include schemaLocation="sharedXsd.xsd"/>
<xs:complexType name="actionXsd"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="action" type="NonEmptyString"/> <xs:element name="xsd" type="NonEmptyString"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="xsds"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="baseXsd" type="NonEmptyString"/> <xs:element name="sharedXsd" type="NonEmptyString"/> <xs:element name="actionXsd" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="actionXsd"></xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="resource"> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="xsds" type="xsds"/> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="getResources_responsedata"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="resource" type="resource"></xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
</xs:schema>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:include schemaLocation="sharedXsd.xsd"/>
<xs:complexType name="getstatus_metadata"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="field" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="key" type="NonEmptyString"/> <xs:attribute name="value" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="system"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="NonEmptyString" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="type" type="NonEmptyString" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="info" type="getstatus_metadata" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="systems"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="system" type="system" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="getStatus_responsedata"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="product" type="NonEmptyString" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="version" type="NonEmptyString" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="build" type="xs:int" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="aciport" type="xs:int" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="serviceport" type="xs:int" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="directory" type="NonEmptyString" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="acithreads" type="xs:int" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="systems" type="systems" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" /> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
</xs:schema>
